subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong and Alberto Contador, teammates on Astana, are expected to challenge each other on Friday in the Pyrenees, the Tour de France’s most challenging stage yet.
snippet: Lance Armstrong and Alberto Contador, teammates on Astana, are expected to challenge each other on Friday in the Pyrenees, the Tour de France’s most challenging stage yet.
